SELECT ort.trailNo ,ort.name ,ort.distance ,ort.eta ,ort.regDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn ,ot.trailNo ,ot.name ,ot.distance ,ot.eta ,ot.regDate FROM (SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate
FROM coords c, trail t
FROM coords c, trailStar ts, trail t
JOIN
LEFT OUTER JOIN
( SELECT COUNT(tt.walkLogNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailUsed tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo
( SELECT COUNT(tt.userNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailStar tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo
( SELECT COUNT(tt.userNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailCmt tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo AND tt.status = 'T'
( SELECT ta.trailNo FROM trailTag ta WHERE ta.trailNo > 0
AND ta.tagName IN
#{item}
GROUP BY tt.trailNo ) gt
GROUP BY ta.trailNo ) gt
ON t.trailNo = gt.trailNo WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swX} AND #{coordsMap.neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swY} AND #{coordsMap.neY} AND t.status = 'T'
AND t.userNo = #{userNo}
AND t.trailNo = ts.trailNo AND ts.userNo = #{userNo}
ORDER BY gt.cnt DESC NULLS LAST, regDate DESC, t.trailNo DESC
ORDER BY t.regDate DESC, t.trailNo DESC
) ot ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 10

SELECT ort.walkLogNo ,ort.userNo ,ort.distance ,ort.logTime ,ort.regDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn ,ot.walkLogNo ,ot.userNo ,ot.distance ,ot.logTime ,ot.regDate FROM (SELECT w.walkLogNo ,w.userNo ,w.distance ,w.logTime ,TO_CHAR(w.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate FROM coords c, walkLog w
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(userNo) cnt ,useNo FROM userLike WHERE type = 'walkLog' GROUP BY useNo ) gt ON w.walkLogNo = gt.useNo
WHERE w.walkLogNo = c.useNo AND c.type = 'walkLog' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swX} AND #{coordsMap.neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swY} AND #{coordsMap.neY} AND w.status = 'T' AND w.userNo = #{userNo}
ORDER BY regDate DESC, w.walkLogNo DESC
ORDER BY regDate ASC, w.walkLogNo ASC
ORDER BY gt.cnt DESC NULLS LAST, regDate DESC, w.walkLogNo DESC
) ot ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 10

SELECT ort.walkLogNo ,ort.userNo ,ort.code ,ort.distance ,ort.logTime ,ort.regDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn ,ot.walkLogNo ,ot.userNo ,ot.code ,ot.distance ,ot.logTime ,ot.regDate FROM (SELECT w.walklogNo ,u.userNo ,u.code ,w.distance ,w.logTime ,TO_CHAR(w.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate FROM trailUsed tu, walkLog w, users u WHERE tu.walklogno = w.walkLogNo AND w.userNo = u.userNo AND w.status = 'T' AND w.userNo = #{usersVo.userNo} AND tu.trailNo = #{trailNo} ORDER BY regDate DESC, w.walklogNo DESC ) ot ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 3

SELECT ort.userNo ,ort.name ,ort.code FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn ,s.userNo ,s.name ,s.code FROM users s, ( SELECT COUNT(*) cnt ,u.userNo FROM trailUsed tu, walkLog w, users u WHERE tu.walklogno = w.walkLogNo AND w.userNo = u.userNo AND tu.trailNo = #{trailNo} GROUP BY u.userNo ORDER BY cnt DESC ) ot WHERE s.userNo = ot.userNo ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 5

SELECT ort.trailCmtNo ,ort.trailNo ,ort.content ,ort.userNo ,ort.name userName ,ort.code ,ort.regDate ,ort.cnt FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn ,ot.trailCmtNo ,ot.trailNo ,ot.content ,ot.userNo ,ot.name ,ot.code ,ot.regDate ,ot.cnt FROM (SELECT t.trailCmtNo ,t.trailNo ,t.content ,u.userNo ,u.name ,u.code ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate ,gt.cnt FROM users u, trailCmt t LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(likeNo) cnt ,useNo FROM userLike WHERE type = 'trailCmt' GROUP BY useNo ) gt ON t.trailCmtNo = gt.useNo WHERE t.userNo = u.userNo AND t.trailNo = #{trailNo} AND t.status = 'T'
ORDER BY DECODE(u.userNo, #{userNo}, 1), regDate DESC, trailCmtNo DESC

) ot ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 10
